entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
